# SCSIType00OutParameters

**Structure**

Parameters for commands to send to the external SCSI device.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SCSIType00OutParameters;
```

## Discussion

This type contains all the fields from [doc://com.apple.scsiperipheralsdriverkit/documentation/SCSIPeripheralsDriverKit/SCSIDeviceOutParameters], typed for use only with [doc://com.apple.scsiperipheralsdriverkit/documentation/SCSIPeripheralsDriverKit/IOUserSCSIPeripheralDeviceType00] devices.

## Sending commands to the device

- **UserSendCDB**: Sends a vendor-specific Command Descriptor Block (CDB) to the device.
- **SCSIType00OutVersion**: Constants that represent versions of the type 00 outbound interface.
- **SCSIType00InParameters**: Parameters for responses from the external SCSI device.
- **SCSIType00InVersion**: Constants that represent versions of the type 00 inbound interface.

## Inherits From

- SCSIDeviceOutParameters
